casebody.data:
Daniel COLLAZO, et al., Appellants,
v.
NETHERLAND PROPERTY ASSETS LLC et al., Respondents. 2019-739 Court of Appeals of New York. August 29, 2019

Motion by New York State Division of Housing and Community Renewal et al. for leave to appear amici curiae on the appeal herein granted only to the extent that the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, *1313nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
